activities: For purposes of clarity, WeddingWire's Safe Harbor Certification is applicable to WeddingWire, Inc. and its subsidiaries and affiliates, including, without limitation, WWLB Management, LLC, Something Blue, LLC, Something Gold, LLC, WW India, LLC, and Something New, LLC.  WeddingWire receives customer and user information from Switzerland for the following purposes: handling orders; delivering products and services; processing payments; generally facilitating transactions; communicating with customers and users about orders, products, services and promotional offers; customer and user support; updating our records and maintaining customer and user accounts; displaying content; and recommending merchandise and services that might be of interest to our customers or users.  We also use this information to prevent or detect fraud or abuses of our web sites, address anti-piracy enforcement activities and enable third parties to carry out technical, logistical or other functions on our behalf.
personaldata: Personal Data Covered: off-line, on-line, and manually processed data; customer and user data
privacyprograms: International Center for Dispute Resolution/American Arbitration Association
recoursemech: Dispute Resolution: AAA/ICDR dispute resolution services.
